insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into olderbase (olderName, olderSex, olderBirthday, olderPassword, olderTel, olderAddress, olderSingleStatus, olderIDE, olderNation, olderHeadUrl, olderPoint, olderBranchId) values (#{oldername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldersex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{olderbirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{olderpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{olderaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldersinglestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{olderide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldernation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{olderheadurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{olderpoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{olderbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
